name: codelab-bootstrap
description: use nodemon to watch changes on md file, rebuild codelab on saves

scripts.install-claat: test -f claat || (OS=$(uname -s | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]'); curl -Lo claat "https://github.com/googlecodelabs/tools/releases/latest/download/claat-$OS-amd64" && chmod +x claat)
scripts.docs:serve: pnpm install-claat && nodemon --watch index.md --exec './claat export -o dist index.md && http-server dist/index'
